2257
2258void CSolver::Gauss_Elimination(su2double** A, su2double* rhs, unsigned short nVar) {
2259
2260 short iVar, jVar, kVar;
2261 su2double weight, aux;
2262
2263 if (nVar == 1)
2264 rhs[0] /= A[0][0];
2265 else {
2266
2267 /*--- Transform system in Upper Matrix ---*/
2268
2269 for (iVar = 1; iVar < (short)nVar; iVar++) {
2270 for (jVar = 0; jVar < iVar; jVar++) {
2271 weight = A[iVar][jVar]/A[jVar][jVar];
2272 for (kVar = jVar; kVar < (short)nVar; kVar++)
2273 A[iVar][kVar] -= weight*A[jVar][kVar];
2274 rhs[iVar] -= weight*rhs[jVar];
2275 }
2276 }
2277
2278 /*--- Backwards substitution ---*/
2279
2280 rhs[nVar-1] = rhs[nVar-1]/A[nVar-1][nVar-1];
2281 for (iVar = (short)nVar-2; iVar >= 0; iVar--) {
2282 aux = 0;
2283 for (jVar = iVar+1; jVar < (short)nVar; jVar++)
2284 aux += A[iVar][jVar]*rhs[jVar];
2285 rhs[iVar] = (rhs[iVar]-aux)/A[iVar][iVar];
2286 if (iVar == 0) break;
2287 }
2288 }
2289
2290}
2291
2292void CSolver::Aeroelastic(CSurfaceMovement *surface_movement, CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned long TimeIter) {
2293
2294 /*--- Variables used for Aeroelastic case ---*/
2295
2296 su2double Cl, Cd, Cn, Ct, Cm, Cn_rot;
2297 su2double Alpha = config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
2298 vector<su2double> structural_solution(4,0.0); //contains solution(displacements and rates) of typical section wing model.
2299
2300 unsigned short iMarker, iMarker_Monitoring, Monitoring;
2301 string Marker_Tag, Monitoring_Tag;
2302
2303 /*--- Loop over markers and find the ones being monitored. ---*/
2304
2305 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
2306 Monitoring = config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker);
2307 if (Monitoring == YES) {
2308
2309 /*--- Find the particular marker being monitored and get the forces acting on it. ---*/
2310
2311 for (iMarker_Monitoring = 0; iMarker_Monitoring < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); iMarker_Monitoring++) {
2312 Monitoring_Tag = config->GetMarker_Monitoring_TagBound(iMarker_Monitoring);
2313 Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
2314 if (Marker_Tag == Monitoring_Tag) {
2315
2316 Cl = GetSurface_CL(iMarker_Monitoring);
2317 Cd = GetSurface_CD(iMarker_Monitoring);
2318
2319 /*--- For typical section wing model want the force normal to the airfoil (in the direction of the spring) ---*/
2320 Cn = Cl*cos(Alpha) + Cd*sin(Alpha);
2321 Ct = -Cl*sin(Alpha) + Cd*cos(Alpha);
2322
2323 Cm = GetSurface_CMz(iMarker_Monitoring);
2324
2325 /*--- Calculate forces for the Typical Section Wing Model taking into account rotation ---*/
2326
2327 /*--- Note that the calculation of the forces and the subsequent displacements ...
2328 is only correct for the airfoil that starts at the 0 degree position ---*/
2329
2330 if (config->GetKind_GridMovement() == AEROELASTIC_RIGID_MOTION) {
2331 su2double Omega, dt, psi;
2332 dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
2333 Omega = (config->GetRotation_Rate(2)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
2334 psi = Omega*(dt*TimeIter);
2335
2336 /*--- Correct for the airfoil starting position (This is hardcoded in here) ---*/
2337 if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil1") {
2338 psi = psi + 0.0;
2339 }
2340 else if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil2") {
2341 psi = psi + 2.0/3.0*PI_NUMBER;
2342 }
2343 else if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil3") {
2344 psi = psi + 4.0/3.0*PI_NUMBER;
2345 }
2346 else
2347 cout << "WARNING: There is a marker that we are monitoring that doesn't match the values hardcoded above!" << endl;
2348
2349 cout << Monitoring_Tag << " position " << psi*180.0/PI_NUMBER << " degrees. " << endl;
2350
2351 Cn_rot = Cn*cos(psi) - Ct*sin(psi); //Note the signs are different for accounting for the AOA.
2352 Cn = Cn_rot;
2353 }
2354
2355 /*--- Solve the aeroelastic equations for the particular marker(surface) ---*/
2356
2357 SolveTypicalSectionWingModel(geometry, Cn, Cm, config, iMarker_Monitoring, structural_solution);
2358
2359 break;
2360 }
2361 }
2362
2363 /*--- Compute the new surface node locations ---*/
2364 surface_movement->AeroelasticDeform(geometry, config, TimeIter, iMarker, iMarker_Monitoring, structural_solution);
2365
2366 }
2367
2368 }
2369
2370}
2371
2372void CSolver::SetUpTypicalSectionWingModel(vector<vector<su2double> >& Phi, vector<su2double>& omega, CConfig *config) {
2373
2374 /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
2375 su2double w_h = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Plunge();
2376 su2double w_a = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Pitch();
2377 su2double x_a = config->GetAeroelastic_CG_Location();
2378 su2double r_a = sqrt(config->GetAeroelastic_Radius_Gyration_Squared());
2379 su2double w = w_h/w_a;
2380
2381 // Mass Matrix
2382 vector<vector<su2double> > M(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2383 M[0][0] = 1;
2384 M[0][1] = x_a;
2385 M[1][0] = x_a;
2386 M[1][1] = r_a*r_a;
2387
2388 // Stiffness Matrix
2389 // vector<vector<su2double> > K(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2390 // K[0][0] = (w_h/w_a)*(w_h/w_a);
2391 // K[0][1] = 0.0;
2392 // K[1][0] = 0.0;
2393 // K[1][1] = r_a*r_a;
2394
2395 /* Eigenvector and Eigenvalue Matrices of the Generalized EigenValue Problem. */
2396
2397 vector<vector<su2double> > Omega2(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2398 su2double aux; // auxiliary variable
2399 aux = sqrt(pow(r_a,2)*pow(w,4) - 2*pow(r_a,2)*pow(w,2) + pow(r_a,2) + 4*pow(x_a,2)*pow(w,2));
2400 Phi[0][0] = (r_a * (r_a - r_a*pow(w,2) + aux)) / (2*x_a*pow(w, 2));
2401 Phi[0][1] = (r_a * (r_a - r_a*pow(w,2) - aux)) / (2*x_a*pow(w, 2));
2402 Phi[1][0] = 1.0;
2403 Phi[1][1] = 1.0;
2404
2405 Omega2[0][0] = (r_a * (r_a + r_a*pow(w,2) - aux)) / (2*(pow(r_a, 2) - pow(x_a, 2)));
2406 Omega2[0][1] = 0;
2407 Omega2[1][0] = 0;
2408 Omega2[1][1] = (r_a * (r_a + r_a*pow(w,2) + aux)) / (2*(pow(r_a, 2) - pow(x_a, 2)));
2409
2410 /* Nondimesionalize the Eigenvectors such that Phi'*M*Phi = I and PHI'*K*PHI = Omega */
2411 // Phi'*M*Phi = D
2412 // D^(-1/2)*Phi'*M*Phi*D^(-1/2) = D^(-1/2)*D^(1/2)*D^(1/2)*D^(-1/2) = I, D^(-1/2) = inv(sqrt(D))
2413 // Phi = Phi*D^(-1/2)
2414
2415 vector<vector<su2double> > Aux(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2416 vector<vector<su2double> > D(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2417 // Aux = M*Phi
2418 for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2419 for (int j=0; j<2; j++) {
2420 Aux[i][j] = 0;
2421 for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2422 Aux[i][j] += M[i][k]*Phi[k][j];
2423 }
2424 }
2425 }
2426
2427 // D = Phi'*Aux
2428 for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2429 for (int j=0; j<2; j++) {
2430 D[i][j] = 0;
2431 for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2432 D[i][j] += Phi[k][i]*Aux[k][j]; //PHI transpose
2433 }
2434 }
2435 }
2436
2437 //Modify the first column
2438 Phi[0][0] = Phi[0][0] * 1/sqrt(D[0][0]);
2439 Phi[1][0] = Phi[1][0] * 1/sqrt(D[0][0]);
2440 //Modify the second column
2441 Phi[0][1] = Phi[0][1] * 1/sqrt(D[1][1]);
2442 Phi[1][1] = Phi[1][1] * 1/sqrt(D[1][1]);
2443
2444 // Sqrt of the eigenvalues (frequency of vibration of the modes)
2445 omega[0] = sqrt(Omega2[0][0]);
2446 omega[1] = sqrt(Omega2[1][1]);
2447
2448}
2449
2450void CSolver::SolveTypicalSectionWingModel(CGeometry *geometry, su2double Cl, su2double Cm, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMarker, vector<su2double>& displacements) {
2451
2452 /*--- The aeroelastic model solved in this routine is the typical section wing model
2453 The details of the implementation are similar to those found in J.J. Alonso
2454 "Fully-Implicit Time-Marching Aeroelastic Solutions" 1994. ---*/
2455
2456 /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
2457 su2double w_alpha = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Pitch();
2458 su2double vf = config->GetAeroelastic_Flutter_Speed_Index();
2459 su2double b = config->GetLength_Reynolds()/2.0; // airfoil semichord, Reynolds length is by defaul 1.0
2460 su2double dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
2461 dt = dt*w_alpha; //Non-dimensionalize the structural time.
2462
2463 /*--- Structural Equation damping ---*/
2464 vector<su2double> xi(2,0.0);
2465
2466 /*--- Eigenvectors and Eigenvalues of the Generalized EigenValue Problem. ---*/
2467 vector<vector<su2double> > Phi(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0)); // generalized eigenvectors.
2468 vector<su2double> w(2,0.0); // sqrt of the generalized eigenvalues (frequency of vibration of the modes).
2469 SetUpTypicalSectionWingModel(Phi, w, config);
2470
2471 /*--- Solving the Decoupled Aeroelastic Problem with second order time discretization Eq (9) ---*/
2472
2473 /*--- Solution variables description. //x[j][i], j-entry, i-equation. // Time (n+1)->np1, n->n, (n-1)->n1 ---*/
2474 vector<vector<su2double> > x_np1(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2475
2476 /*--- Values from previous movement of spring at true time step n+1
2477 We use this values because we are solving for delta changes not absolute changes ---*/
2478 vector<vector<su2double> > x_np1_old = config->GetAeroelastic_np1(iMarker);
2479
2480 /*--- Values at previous timesteps. ---*/
2481 vector<vector<su2double> > x_n = config->GetAeroelastic_n(iMarker);
2482 vector<vector<su2double> > x_n1 = config->GetAeroelastic_n1(iMarker);
2483
2484 /*--- Set up of variables used to solve the structural problem. ---*/
2485 vector<su2double> f_tilde(2,0.0);
2486 vector<vector<su2double> > A_inv(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2487 su2double detA;
2488 su2double s1, s2;
2489 vector<su2double> rhs(2,0.0); //right hand side
2490 vector<su2double> eta(2,0.0);
2491 vector<su2double> eta_dot(2,0.0);
2492
2493 /*--- Forcing Term ---*/
2494 su2double cons = vf*vf/PI_NUMBER;
2495 vector<su2double> f(2,0.0);
2496 f[0] = cons*(-Cl);
2497 f[1] = cons*(2*-Cm);
2498
2499 //f_tilde = Phi'*f
2500 for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2501 f_tilde[i] = 0;
2502 for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2503 f_tilde[i] += Phi[k][i]*f[k]; //PHI transpose
2504 }
2505 }
2506
2507 /*--- solve each decoupled equation (The inverse of the 2x2 matrix is provided) ---*/
2508 for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2509 /* Matrix Inverse */
2510 detA = 9.0/(4.0*dt*dt) + 3*w[i]*xi[i]/(dt) + w[i]*w[i];
2511 A_inv[0][0] = 1/detA * (3/(2.0*dt) + 2*xi[i]*w[i]);
2512 A_inv[0][1] = 1/detA * 1;
2513 A_inv[1][0] = 1/detA * -w[i]*w[i];
2514 A_inv[1][1] = 1/detA * 3/(2.0*dt);
2515
2516 /* Source Terms from previous iterations */
2517 s1 = (-4*x_n[0][i] + x_n1[0][i])/(2.0*dt);
2518 s2 = (-4*x_n[1][i] + x_n1[1][i])/(2.0*dt);
2519
2520 /* Problem Right Hand Side */
2521 rhs[0] = -s1;
2522 rhs[1] = f_tilde[i]-s2;
2523
2524 /* Solve the equations */
2525 x_np1[0][i] = A_inv[0][0]*rhs[0] + A_inv[0][1]*rhs[1];
2526 x_np1[1][i] = A_inv[1][0]*rhs[0] + A_inv[1][1]*rhs[1];
2527
2528 eta[i] = x_np1[0][i]-x_np1_old[0][i]; // For displacements, the change(deltas) is used.
2529 eta_dot[i] = x_np1[1][i]; // For velocities, absolute values are used.
2530 }
2531
2532 /*--- Transform back from the generalized coordinates to get the actual displacements in plunge and pitch q = Phi*eta ---*/
2533 vector<su2double> q(2,0.0);
2534 vector<su2double> q_dot(2,0.0);
2535 for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2536 q[i] = 0;
2537 q_dot[i] = 0;
2538 for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2539 q[i] += Phi[i][k]*eta[k];
2540 q_dot[i] += Phi[i][k]*eta_dot[k];
2541 }
2542 }
2543
2544 su2double dh = b*q[0];
2545 su2double dalpha = q[1];
2546
2547 su2double h_dot = w_alpha*b*q_dot[0]; //The w_a brings it back to actual time.
2548 su2double alpha_dot = w_alpha*q_dot[1];
2549
2550 /*--- Set the solution of the structural equations ---*/
2551 displacements[0] = dh;
2552 displacements[1] = dalpha;
2553 displacements[2] = h_dot;
2554 displacements[3] = alpha_dot;
2555
2556 /*--- Calculate the total plunge and total pitch displacements for the unsteady step by summing the displacement at each sudo time step ---*/
2557 su2double pitch, plunge;
2558 pitch = config->GetAeroelastic_pitch(iMarker);
2559 plunge = config->GetAeroelastic_plunge(iMarker);
2560
2561 config->SetAeroelastic_pitch(iMarker , pitch+dalpha);
2562 config->SetAeroelastic_plunge(iMarker , plunge+dh/b);
2563
2564 /*--- Set the Aeroelastic solution at time n+1. This gets update every sudo time step
2565 and after convering the sudo time step the solution at n+1 get moved to the solution at n
2566 in SetDualTime_Solver method ---*/
2567
2568 config->SetAeroelastic_np1(iMarker, x_np1);
2569
2570}

2572void CSolver::Restart_OldGeometry(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) const {
2573
2574 BEGIN_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS {
2575
2576 /*--- This function is intended for dual time simulations ---*/
2577
2578 int Unst_RestartIter;
2579 ifstream restart_file_n;
2580
2581 string filename = config->GetSolution_FileName();
2582 string filename_n;
2583
2584 /*--- Auxiliary vector for storing the coordinates ---*/
2585 su2double Coord[3] = {0.0};
2586
2587 /*--- Variables for reading the restart files ---*/
2588 string text_line;
2589 long iPoint_Local;
2590 unsigned long iPoint_Global_Local = 0, iPoint_Global = 0;
2591
2592 /*--- First, we load the restart file for time n ---*/
2593
2594 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2595
2596 /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
2597 if (config->GetRestart()) Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetRestart_Iter())-1;
2598 else Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetUnst_AdjointIter())-1;
2599 filename_n = config->GetFilename(filename, ".csv", Unst_RestartIter);
2600
2601 /*--- Open the restart file, throw an error if this fails. ---*/
2602
2603 restart_file_n.open(filename_n.data(), ios::in);
2604 if (restart_file_n.fail()) {
2605 SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is no flow restart file ") + filename_n, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2606 }
2607
2608 /*--- First, set all indices to a negative value by default, and Global n indices to 0 ---*/
2609 iPoint_Global_Local = 0; iPoint_Global = 0;
2610
2611 /*--- Read all lines in the restart file ---*/
2612 /*--- The first line is the header ---*/
2613
2614 getline (restart_file_n, text_line);
2615
2616 for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
2617
2618 getline (restart_file_n, text_line);
2619
2620 vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, ',');
2621
2622 /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
2623 on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
2624
2625 iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
2626
2627 if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
2628
2629 Coord[0] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[1]);
2630 Coord[1] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[2]);
2631 if (nDim == 3){
2632 Coord[2] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[3]);
2633 }
2634 geometry->nodes->SetCoord_n(iPoint_Local, Coord);
2635
2636 iPoint_Global_Local++;
2637 }
2638 }
2639
2640 /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
2641
2642 if (iPoint_Global_Local < geometry->GetnPointDomain()) {
2643 SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
2644 string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2645 }
2646
2647 /*--- Close the restart file ---*/
2648
2649 restart_file_n.close();
2650
2651 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2652 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2653
2654 /*--- Now, we load the restart file for time n-1, if the simulation is 2nd Order ---*/
2655
2656 if (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::DT_STEPPING_2ND) {
2657
2658 ifstream restart_file_n1;
2659 string filename_n1;
2660
2661 /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
2662 if (config->GetRestart()) Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetRestart_Iter())-2;
2663 else Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetUnst_AdjointIter())-2;
2664 filename_n1 = config->GetFilename(filename, ".csv", Unst_RestartIter);
2665
2666 /*--- Open the restart file, throw an error if this fails. ---*/
2667
2668 restart_file_n1.open(filename_n1.data(), ios::in);
2669 if (restart_file_n1.fail()) {
2670 SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is no flow restart file ") + filename_n1, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2671
2672 }
2673
2674 /*--- First, set all indices to a negative value by default, and Global n indices to 0 ---*/
2675 iPoint_Global_Local = 0; iPoint_Global = 0;
2676
2677 /*--- Read all lines in the restart file ---*/
2678 /*--- The first line is the header ---*/
2679
2680 getline (restart_file_n1, text_line);
2681
2682 for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
2683
2684 getline (restart_file_n1, text_line);
2685
2686 vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, ',');
2687
2688 /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
2689 on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
2690
2691 iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
2692
2693 if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
2694
2695 Coord[0] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[1]);
2696 Coord[1] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[2]);
2697 if (nDim == 3){
2698 Coord[2] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[3]);
2699 }
2700
2701 geometry->nodes->SetCoord_n1(iPoint_Local, Coord);
2702
2703 iPoint_Global_Local++;
2704 }
2705
2706 }
2707
2708 /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
2709
2710 if (iPoint_Global_Local < geometry->GetnPointDomain()) {
2711 SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
2712 string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2713 }
2714
2715 /*--- Close the restart file ---*/
2716
2717 restart_file_n1.close();
2718
2719 }
2720
2721 }
2722 END_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS
2723
2724 /*--- It's necessary to communicate this information ---*/
2725
2726 geometry->InitiateComms(geometry, config, COORDINATES_OLD);
2727 geometry->CompleteComms(geometry, config, COORDINATES_OLD);
2728
2729}
2730
2731void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_ASCII(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config, string val_filename) {
2732
2733 ifstream restart_file;
2734 string text_line, Tag;
2735 unsigned short iVar;
2736 long iPoint_Local = 0; unsigned long iPoint_Global = 0;
2737 int counter = 0;
2738 fields.clear();
2739
2740 Restart_Vars.resize(5);
2741
2742 string error_string = "Note: ASCII restart files must be in CSV format since v7.0.\n"
2743 "Check https://su2code.github.io/docs/Guide-to-v7 for more information.";
2744
2745 /*--- First, check that this is not a binary restart file. ---*/
2746
2747 char fname[100];
2748 val_filename += ".csv";
2749 strcpy(fname, val_filename.c_str());
2750 int magic_number;
2751
2752#ifndef HAVE_MPI
2753
2754 /*--- Serial binary input. ---*/
2755
2756 FILE *fhw;
2757 fhw = fopen(fname,"rb");
2758 size_t ret;
2759
2760 /*--- Error check for opening the file. ---*/
2761
2762 if (!fhw) {
2763 SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + fname, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2764 }
2765
2766 /*--- Attempt to read the first int, which should be our magic number. ---*/
2767
2768 ret = fread(&magic_number, sizeof(int), 1, fhw);
2769 if (ret != 1) {
2770 SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2771 }
2772
2773 /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2774 have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2775
2776 if (magic_number == 535532) {
2777 SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is a binary SU2 restart file, expected ASCII.\n") +
2778 string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
2779 string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
2780 string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2781 }
2782
2783 fclose(fhw);
2784
2785#else
2786
2787 /*--- Parallel binary input using MPI I/O. ---*/
2788
2789 MPI_File fhw;
2790 int ierr;
2791
2792 /*--- All ranks open the file using MPI. ---*/
2793
2794 ierr = MPI_File_open(SU2_MPI::GetComm(), fname, MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_INFO_NULL, &fhw);
2795
2796 /*--- Error check opening the file. ---*/
2797
2798 if (ierr) {
2799 SU2_MPI::Error(string("SU2 ASCII restart file ") + string(fname) + string(" not found.\n") + error_string,
2800 CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2801 }
2802
2803 /*--- Have the master attempt to read the magic number. ---*/
2804
2805 if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
2806 MPI_File_read(fhw, &magic_number, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
2807
2808 /*--- Broadcast the number of variables to all procs and store clearly. ---*/
2809
2810 SU2_MPI::Bcast(&magic_number, 1, MPI_INT, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2811
2812 /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2813 have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2814
2815 if (magic_number == 535532) {
2816 SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is a binary SU2 restart file, expected ASCII.\n") +
2817 string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
2818 string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
2819 string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2820 }
2821
2822 MPI_File_close(&fhw);
2823
2824#endif
2825
2826 /*--- Open the restart file ---*/
2827
2828 restart_file.open(val_filename.data(), ios::in);
2829
2830 /*--- In case there is no restart file ---*/
2831
2832 if (restart_file.fail()) {
2833 SU2_MPI::Error(string("SU2 ASCII restart file ") + string(fname) + string(" not found.\n") + error_string,
2834 CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2835 }
2836
2837 /*--- Identify the number of fields (and names) in the restart file ---*/
2838
2839 getline (restart_file, text_line);
2840
2841 char delimiter = ',';
2842 fields = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, delimiter);
2843
2844 if (fields.size() <= 1) {
2845 SU2_MPI::Error(string("Restart file does not seem to be a CSV file.\n") + error_string, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2846 }
2847
2848 for (unsigned short iField = 0; iField < fields.size(); iField++){
2849 PrintingToolbox::trim(fields[iField]);
2850 }
2851
2852 /*--- Set the number of variables, one per field in the
2853 restart file (without including the PointID) ---*/
2854
2855 Restart_Vars[1] = (int)fields.size() - 1;
2856
2857 /*--- Allocate memory for the restart data. ---*/
2858
2859 Restart_Data.resize(Restart_Vars[1]*geometry->GetnPointDomain());
2860
2861 /*--- Read all lines in the restart file and extract data. ---*/
2862
2863 for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++) {
2864
2865 if (!getline (restart_file, text_line)) break;
2866
2867 /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
2868 on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
2869
2870 iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
2871
2872 if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
2873
2874 vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, delimiter);
2875
2876 /*--- Store the solution (starting with node coordinates) --*/
2877
2878 for (iVar = 0; iVar < Restart_Vars[1]; iVar++)
2879 Restart_Data[counter*Restart_Vars[1] + iVar] = SU2_TYPE::GetValue(PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[iVar+1]));
2880
2881 /*--- Increment our local point counter. ---*/
2882
2883 counter++;
2884
2885 }
2886 }
2887
2888 if (iPoint_Global != geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain())
2889 SU2_MPI::Error("The solution file does not match the mesh, currently only binary files can be interpolated.",
2890 CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2891
2892}
2893
2894void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_Binary(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config, string val_filename) {
2895
2896 char str_buf[CGNS_STRING_SIZE], fname[100];
2897 val_filename += ".dat";
2898 strcpy(fname, val_filename.c_str());
2899 const int nRestart_Vars = 5;
2900 Restart_Vars.resize(nRestart_Vars);
2901 fields.clear();
2902
2903#ifndef HAVE_MPI
2904
2905 /*--- Serial binary input. ---*/
2906
2907 FILE *fhw;
2908 fhw = fopen(fname,"rb");
2909 size_t ret;
2910
2911 /*--- Error check for opening the file. ---*/
2912
2913 if (!fhw) {
2914 SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + string(fname), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2915 }
2916
2917 /*--- First, read the number of variables and points. ---*/
2918
2919 ret = fread(Restart_Vars.data(), sizeof(int), nRestart_Vars, fhw);
2920 if (ret != (unsigned long)nRestart_Vars) {
2921 SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2922 }
2923
2924 /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2925 have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2926
2927 if (Restart_Vars[0] != 535532) {
2928 SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is not a binary SU2 restart file.\n") +
2929 string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
2930 string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
2931 string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2932 }
2933
2934 /*--- Store the number of fields and points to be read for clarity. ---*/
2935
2936 const unsigned long nFields = Restart_Vars[1];
2937 const unsigned long nPointFile = Restart_Vars[2];
2938
2939 /*--- Read the variable names from the file. Note that we are adopting a
2940 fixed length of 33 for the string length to match with CGNS. This is
2941 needed for when we read the strings later. We pad the beginning of the
2942 variable string vector with the Point_ID tag that wasn't written. ---*/
2943
2944 fields.push_back("Point_ID");
2945 for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nFields; iVar++) {
2946 ret = fread(str_buf, sizeof(char), CGNS_STRING_SIZE, fhw);
2947 if (ret != (unsigned long)CGNS_STRING_SIZE) {
2948 SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2949 }
2950 fields.push_back(str_buf);
2951 }
2952
2953 /*--- For now, create a temp 1D buffer to read the data from file. ---*/
2954
2955 Restart_Data.resize(nFields*nPointFile);
2956
2957 /*--- Read in the data for the restart at all local points. ---*/
2958
2959 ret = fread(Restart_Data.data(), sizeof(passivedouble), nFields*nPointFile, fhw);
2960 if (ret != nFields*nPointFile) {
2961 SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2962 }
2963
2964 /*--- Close the file. ---*/
2965
2966 fclose(fhw);
2967
2968#else
2969
2970 /*--- Parallel binary input using MPI I/O. ---*/
2971
2972 MPI_File fhw;
2973 SU2_MPI::Status status;
2974 MPI_Datatype etype, filetype;
2975 MPI_Offset disp;
2976
2977 /*--- All ranks open the file using MPI. ---*/
2978
2979 int ierr = MPI_File_open(SU2_MPI::GetComm(), fname, MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_INFO_NULL, &fhw);
2980
2981 if (ierr) SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + string(fname), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2982
2983 /*--- First, read the number of variables and points (i.e., cols and rows),
2984 which we will need in order to read the file later. Also, read the
2985 variable string names here. Only the master rank reads the header. ---*/
2986
2987 if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
2988 MPI_File_read(fhw, Restart_Vars.data(), nRestart_Vars, MPI_INT, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
2989
2990 /*--- Broadcast the number of variables to all procs and store clearly. ---*/
2991
2992 SU2_MPI::Bcast(Restart_Vars.data(), nRestart_Vars, MPI_INT, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2993
2994 /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2995 have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2996
2997 if (Restart_Vars[0] != 535532) {
2998 SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is not a binary SU2 restart file.\n") +
2999 string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
3000 string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
3001 string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3002 }
3003
3004 /*--- Store the number of fields and points to be read for clarity. ---*/
3005
3006 const unsigned long nFields = Restart_Vars[1];
3007 const unsigned long nPointFile = Restart_Vars[2];
3008
3009 /*--- Read the variable names from the file. Note that we are adopting a
3010 fixed length of 33 for the string length to match with CGNS. This is
3011 needed for when we read the strings later. ---*/
3012
3013 char *mpi_str_buf = new char[nFields*CGNS_STRING_SIZE];
3014 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3015 disp = nRestart_Vars*sizeof(int);
3016 MPI_File_read_at(fhw, disp, mpi_str_buf, nFields*CGNS_STRING_SIZE,
3017 MPI_CHAR, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3018 }
3019
3020 /*--- Broadcast the string names of the variables. ---*/
3021
3022 SU2_MPI::Bcast(mpi_str_buf, nFields*CGNS_STRING_SIZE, MPI_CHAR,
3023 MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3024
3025 /*--- Now parse the string names and load into the config class in case
3026 we need them for writing visualization files (SU2_SOL). ---*/
3027
3028 fields.emplace_back("Point_ID");
3029 for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nFields; iVar++) {
3030 const auto index = iVar*CGNS_STRING_SIZE;
3031 string field_buf("\"");
3032 for (int iChar = 0; iChar < CGNS_STRING_SIZE; iChar++) {
3033 str_buf[iChar] = mpi_str_buf[index + iChar];
3034 }
3035 field_buf.append(str_buf);
3036 field_buf.append("\"");
3037 fields.emplace_back(field_buf.c_str());
3038 }
3039
3040 /*--- Free string buffer memory. ---*/
3041
3042 delete [] mpi_str_buf;
3043
3044 /*--- We're writing only su2doubles in the data portion of the file. ---*/
3045
3046 etype = MPI_DOUBLE;
3047
3048 /*--- We need to ignore the 4 ints describing the nVar_Restart and nPoints,
3049 along with the string names of the variables. ---*/
3050
3051 disp = nRestart_Vars*sizeof(int) + CGNS_STRING_SIZE*nFields*sizeof(char);
3052
3053 /*--- Define a derived datatype for this rank's set of non-contiguous data
3054 that will be placed in the restart. Here, we are collecting each one of the
3055 points which are distributed throughout the file in blocks of nVar_Restart data. ---*/
3056
3057 int nBlock;
3058 int *blocklen = nullptr;
3059 MPI_Aint *displace = nullptr;
3060
3061 if (nPointFile == geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() ||
3062 config->GetKind_SU2() == SU2_COMPONENT::SU2_SOL) {
3063 /*--- No interpolation, each rank reads the indices it needs. ---*/
3064 nBlock = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
3065
3066 blocklen = new int[nBlock];
3067 displace = new MPI_Aint[nBlock];
3068 int counter = 0;
3069 for (auto iPoint_Global = 0ul; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); ++iPoint_Global) {
3070 if (geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global) > -1) {
3071 blocklen[counter] = nFields;
3072 displace[counter] = iPoint_Global*nFields*sizeof(passivedouble);
3073 counter++;
3074 }
3075 }
3076 }
3077 else {
3078 /*--- Interpolation required, read large blocks of data. ---*/
3079 nBlock = 1;
3080
3081 blocklen = new int[nBlock];
3082 displace = new MPI_Aint[nBlock];
3083
3084 const auto partitioner = CLinearPartitioner(nPointFile,0);
3085
3086 blocklen[0] = nFields*partitioner.GetSizeOnRank(rank);
3087 displace[0] = nFields*partitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank)*sizeof(passivedouble);;
3088 }
3089
3090 MPI_Type_create_hindexed(nBlock, blocklen, displace, MPI_DOUBLE, &filetype);
3091 MPI_Type_commit(&filetype);
3092
3093 /*--- Set the view for the MPI file write, i.e., describe the location in
3094 the file that this rank "sees" for writing its piece of the restart file. ---*/
3095
3096 MPI_File_set_view(fhw, disp, etype, filetype, (char*)"native", MPI_INFO_NULL);
3097
3098 /*--- For now, create a temp 1D buffer to read the data from file. ---*/
3099
3100 const int bufSize = nBlock*blocklen[0];
3101 Restart_Data.resize(bufSize);
3102
3103 /*--- Collective call for all ranks to read from their view simultaneously. ---*/
3104
3105 MPI_File_read_all(fhw, Restart_Data.data(), bufSize, MPI_DOUBLE, &status);
3106
3107 /*--- All ranks close the file after writing. ---*/
3108
3109 MPI_File_close(&fhw);
3110
3111 /*--- Free the derived datatype and release temp memory. ---*/
3112
3113 MPI_Type_free(&filetype);
3114
3115 delete [] blocklen;
3116 delete [] displace;
3117
3118#endif
3119
3120 if (nPointFile != geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() &&
3121 config->GetKind_SU2() != SU2_COMPONENT::SU2_SOL) {
3122 InterpolateRestartData(geometry, config);
3123 }
3124}
3125
3126void CSolver::InterpolateRestartData(const CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config) {
3127
3128 if (geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() == 0) return;
3129
3130 if (size != SINGLE_NODE && size % 2)
3131 SU2_MPI::Error("Number of ranks must be multiple of 2.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3132
3133 if (config->GetFEMSolver())
3134 SU2_MPI::Error("Cannot interpolate the restart file for FEM problems.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3135
3136 /* Challenges:
3137 * - Do not use too much memory by gathering the restart data in all ranks.
3138 * - Do not repeat too many computations in all ranks.
3139 * Solution?:
3140 * - Build a local ADT for the domain points (not the restart points).
3141 * - Find the closest target point for each donor, which does not match all targets.
3142 * - "Diffuse" the data to neighbor points.
3143 * Complexity is approx. Nlt + (Nlt + Nd) log(Nlt) where Nlt is the LOCAL number
3144 * of target points and Nd the TOTAL number of donors. */
3145
3146 const unsigned long nFields = Restart_Vars[1];
3147 const unsigned long nPointFile = Restart_Vars[2];
3148 const auto t0 = SU2_MPI::Wtime();
3149 auto nRecurse = 0;
3150
3151 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3152 cout << "\nThe number of points in the restart file (" << nPointFile << ") does not match "
3153 "the mesh (" << geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() << ").\n"
3154 "A recursive nearest neighbor interpolation will be performed." << endl;
3155 }
3156
3157 su2activematrix localVars(nPointDomain, nFields);
3158 localVars = su2double(0.0);
3159 {
3160 su2vector<uint8_t> isMapped(nPoint);
3161 isMapped = false;
3162
3163 /*--- ADT of local target points. ---*/
3164 {
3165 const auto& coord = geometry->nodes->GetCoord();
3166 vector<unsigned long> index(nPointDomain);
3167 iota(index.begin(), index.end(), 0ul);
3168
3169 CADTPointsOnlyClass adt(nDim, nPointDomain, coord.data(), index.data(), false);
3170 vector<unsigned long>().swap(index);
3171
3172 /*--- Copy local donor restart data, which will circulate over all ranks. ---*/
3173
3174 const auto partitioner = CLinearPartitioner(nPointFile,0);
3175
3176 unsigned long nPointDonorMax = 0;
3177 for (int i=0; i<size; ++i)
3178 nPointDonorMax = max(nPointDonorMax, partitioner.GetSizeOnRank(i));
3179
3180 su2activematrix sendBuf(nPointDonorMax, nFields);
3181
3182 for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDonorMax; ++iPoint) {
3183 const auto iPointDonor = min(iPoint,partitioner.GetSizeOnRank(rank)-1ul);
3184 for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < nFields; ++iVar)
3185 sendBuf(iPoint,iVar) = Restart_Data[iPointDonor*nFields+iVar];
3186 }
3187
3188 Restart_Data = decltype(Restart_Data){};
3189
3190 /*--- Make room to receive donor data from other ranks, and to map it to target points. ---*/
3191
3192 su2activematrix donorVars(nPointDonorMax, nFields);
3193 vector<su2double> donorDist(nPointDomain, 1e12);
3194
3195 /*--- Circle over all ranks. ---*/
3196
3197 const int dst = (rank+1) % size; // send to next
3198 const int src = (rank-1+size) % size; // receive from prev.
3199 const int count = sendBuf.size();
3200
3201 for (int iStep = 0; iStep < size; ++iStep) {
3202
3203 swap(sendBuf, donorVars);
3204
3205 if (iStep) {
3206 /*--- Odd ranks send and then receive, and vice versa. ---*/
3207 if (rank%2) SU2_MPI::Send(sendBuf.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, dst, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3208 else SU2_MPI::Recv(donorVars.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, src, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3209
3210 if (rank%2==0) SU2_MPI::Send(sendBuf.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, dst, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3211 else SU2_MPI::Recv(donorVars.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, src, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3212 }
3213
3214 /*--- Find the closest target for each donor. ---*/
3215
3216 vector<su2double> targetDist(donorVars.rows());
3217 vector<unsigned long> iTarget(donorVars.rows());
3218
3219 SU2_OMP_PARALLEL_(for schedule(dynamic,4*OMP_MIN_SIZE))
3220 for (auto iDonor = 0ul; iDonor < donorVars.rows(); ++iDonor) {
3221 int r=0;
3222 adt.DetermineNearestNode(donorVars[iDonor], targetDist[iDonor], iTarget[iDonor], r);
3223 }
3224 END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
3225
3226 /*--- Keep the closest donor for each target (this is separate for OpenMP). ---*/
3227
3228 for (auto iDonor = 0ul; iDonor < donorVars.rows(); ++iDonor) {
3229 const auto iPoint = iTarget[iDonor];
3230 const auto dist = targetDist[iDonor];
3231
3232 if (dist < donorDist[iPoint]) {
3233 donorDist[iPoint] = dist;
3234 isMapped[iPoint] = true;
3235 for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < donorVars.cols(); ++iVar)
3236 localVars(iPoint,iVar) = donorVars(iDonor,iVar);
3237 }
3238 }
3239 }
3240 } // everything goes out of scope except "localVars" and "isMapped"
3241
3242 /*--- Recursively diffuse the nearest neighbor data. ---*/
3243
3244 auto nDonor = isMapped;
3245 bool done = false;
3246
3247 SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
3248 while (!done) {
3249 SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nPointDomain,2*omp_get_num_threads()))
3250 for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDomain; ++iPoint) {
3251 /*--- Do not change points that are already interpolated. ---*/
3252 if (isMapped[iPoint]) continue;
3253
3254 /*--- Boundaries to boundaries and domain to domain. ---*/
3255 const bool boundary_i = geometry->nodes->GetSolidBoundary(iPoint);
3256
3257 for (const auto jPoint : geometry->nodes->GetPoints(iPoint)) {
3258 if (!isMapped[jPoint]) continue;
3259 if (boundary_i != geometry->nodes->GetSolidBoundary(jPoint)) continue;
3260
3261 nDonor[iPoint]++;
3262
3263 for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < localVars.cols(); ++iVar)
3264 localVars(iPoint,iVar) += localVars(jPoint,iVar);
3265 }
3266
3267 if (nDonor[iPoint] > 0) {
3268 for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < localVars.cols(); ++iVar)
3269 localVars(iPoint,iVar) /= nDonor[iPoint];
3270 nDonor[iPoint] = true;
3271 }
3272 }
3273 END_SU2_OMP_FOR
3274
3275 /*--- Repeat while all points are not mapped. ---*/
3276
3277 SU2_OMP_MASTER {
3278 done = true;
3279 ++nRecurse;
3280 }
3281 END_SU2_OMP_MASTER
3282
3283 bool myDone = true;
3284
3285 SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(16*OMP_MIN_SIZE)
3286 for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDomain; ++iPoint) {
3287 isMapped[iPoint] = nDonor[iPoint];
3288 myDone &= nDonor[iPoint];
3289 }
3290 END_SU2_OMP_FOR
3291
3292 SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
3293 done &= myDone;
3294
3295 SU2_OMP_BARRIER
3296 }
3297 END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
3298
3299 } // everything goes out of scope except "localVars"
3300
3301 /*--- Move to Restart_Data in ascending order of global index, which is how a matching restart would have been read. ---*/
3302
3303 Restart_Data.resize(nPointDomain*nFields);
3304 Restart_Vars[2] = nPointDomain;
3305
3306 int counter = 0;
3307 for (auto iPoint_Global = 0ul; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); ++iPoint_Global) {
3308 const auto iPoint = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
3309 if (iPoint >= 0) {
3310 for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < nFields; ++iVar)
3311 Restart_Data[counter*nFields+iVar] = SU2_TYPE::GetValue(localVars(iPoint,iVar));
3312 counter++;
3313 }
3314 }
3315
3316 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3317 cout << "Number of recursions: " << nRecurse << ".\n"
3318 "Elapsed time: " << SU2_MPI::Wtime()-t0 << "s.\n" << endl;
3319 }
3320}
3321
3322void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_Metadata(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool adjoint, const string& val_filename) const {
3323
3324 su2double AoA_ = config->GetAoA();
3325 su2double AoS_ = config->GetAoS();
3326 su2double BCThrust_ = config->GetInitial_BCThrust();
3327 su2double dCD_dCL_ = config->GetdCD_dCL();
3328 su2double dCMx_dCL_ = config->GetdCMx_dCL();
3329 su2double dCMy_dCL_ = config->GetdCMy_dCL();
3330 su2double dCMz_dCL_ = config->GetdCMz_dCL();
3331 su2double SPPressureDrop_ = config->GetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop();
3332 string::size_type position;
3333 unsigned long InnerIter_ = 0;
3334 ifstream restart_file;
3335
3336 /*--- Carry on with ASCII metadata reading. ---*/
3337
3338 restart_file.open(val_filename.data(), ios::in);
3339 if (restart_file.fail()) {
3340 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3341 cout << " Warning: There is no restart file (" << val_filename.data() << ")."<< endl;
3342 cout << " Computation will continue without updating metadata parameters." << endl;
3343 }
3344 }
3345 else {
3346
3347 string text_line;
3348
3349 /*--- Space for extra info (if any) ---*/
3350
3351 while (getline (restart_file, text_line)) {
3352
3353 /*--- External iteration ---*/
3354
3355 position = text_line.find ("ITER=",0);
3356 if (position != string::npos) {
3357 // TODO: 'ITER=' has 5 chars, not 9!
3358 text_line.erase (0,9); InnerIter_ = atoi(text_line.c_str());
3359 }
3360
3361 /*--- Angle of attack ---*/
3362
3363 position = text_line.find ("AOA=",0);
3364 if (position != string::npos) {
3365 text_line.erase (0,4); AoA_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3366 }
3367
3368 /*--- Sideslip angle ---*/
3369
3370 position = text_line.find ("SIDESLIP_ANGLE=",0);
3371 if (position != string::npos) {
3372 text_line.erase (0,15); AoS_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3373 }
3374
3375 /*--- BCThrust angle ---*/
3376
3377 position = text_line.find ("INITIAL_BCTHRUST=",0);
3378 if (position != string::npos) {
3379 text_line.erase (0,17); BCThrust_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3380 }
3381
3382 /*--- dCD_dCL coefficient ---*/
3383
3384 position = text_line.find ("DCD_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3385 if (position != string::npos) {
3386 text_line.erase (0,14); dCD_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3387 }
3388
3389 /*--- dCMx_dCL coefficient ---*/
3390
3391 position = text_line.find ("DCMX_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3392 if (position != string::npos) {
3393 text_line.erase (0,15); dCMx_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3394 }
3395
3396 /*--- dCMy_dCL coefficient ---*/
3397
3398 position = text_line.find ("DCMY_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3399 if (position != string::npos) {
3400 text_line.erase (0,15); dCMy_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3401 }
3402
3403 /*--- dCMz_dCL coefficient ---*/
3404
3405 position = text_line.find ("DCMZ_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3406 if (position != string::npos) {
3407 text_line.erase (0,15); dCMz_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3408 }
3409
3410 /*--- Streamwise periodic pressure drop for prescribed massflow cases. ---*/
3411
3412 position = text_line.find ("STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP=",0);
3413 if (position != string::npos) {
3414 // Erase the name from the line, 'STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP=' has 34 chars.
3415 text_line.erase (0,34); SPPressureDrop_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3416 }
3417
3418 }
3419
3420 /*--- Close the restart meta file. ---*/
3421
3422 restart_file.close();
3423
3424 }
3425
3426
3427 /*--- Load the metadata. ---*/
3428
3429 /*--- Angle of attack ---*/
3430
3431 if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3432 if ((config->GetAoA() != AoA_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
3433 cout.precision(6);
3434 cout <<"WARNING: AoA in the solution file (" << AoA_ << " deg.) +" << endl;
3435 cout << " AoA offset in mesh file (" << config->GetAoA_Offset() << " deg.) = " << AoA_ + config->GetAoA_Offset() << " deg." << endl;
3436 }
3437 config->SetAoA(AoA_ + config->GetAoA_Offset());
3438 }
3439
3440 else {
3441 if ((config->GetAoA() != AoA_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3442 cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the AoA in the solution file." << endl;
3443 }
3444
3445 /*--- Sideslip angle ---*/
3446
3447 if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3448 if ((config->GetAoS() != AoS_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
3449 cout.precision(6);
3450 cout <<"WARNING: AoS in the solution file (" << AoS_ << " deg.) +" << endl;
3451 cout << " AoS offset in mesh file (" << config->GetAoS_Offset() << " deg.) = " << AoS_ + config->GetAoS_Offset() << " deg." << endl;
3452 }
3453 config->SetAoS(AoS_ + config->GetAoS_Offset());
3454 }
3455 else {
3456 if ((config->GetAoS() != AoS_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3457 cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the AoS in the solution file." << endl;
3458 }
3459
3460 /*--- BCThrust ---*/
3461
3462 if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3463 if ((config->GetInitial_BCThrust() != BCThrust_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3464 cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the initial BC Thrust provided in the solution file: " << BCThrust_ << " lbs." << endl;
3465 config->SetInitial_BCThrust(BCThrust_);
3466 }
3467 else {
3468 if ((config->GetInitial_BCThrust() != BCThrust_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3469 cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the BC Thrust in the solution file." << endl;
3470 }
3471
3472
3473 if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3474
3475 if ((config->GetdCD_dCL() != dCD_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3476 cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCD/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCD_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3477 config->SetdCD_dCL(dCD_dCL_);
3478
3479 if ((config->GetdCMx_dCL() != dCMx_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3480 cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCMx/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCMx_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3481 config->SetdCMx_dCL(dCMx_dCL_);
3482
3483 if ((config->GetdCMy_dCL() != dCMy_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3484 cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCMy/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCMy_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3485 config->SetdCMy_dCL(dCMy_dCL_);
3486
3487 if ((config->GetdCMz_dCL() != dCMz_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3488 cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCMz/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCMz_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3489 config->SetdCMz_dCL(dCMz_dCL_);
3490
3491 }
3492
3493 else {
3494
3495 if ((config->GetdCD_dCL() != dCD_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3496 cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCD/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3497
3498 if ((config->GetdCMx_dCL() != dCMx_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3499 cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCMx/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3500
3501 if ((config->GetdCMy_dCL() != dCMy_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3502 cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCMy/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3503
3504 if ((config->GetdCMz_dCL() != dCMz_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3505 cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCMz/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3506
3507 }
3508
3509 if (!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) {
3510 if ((config->GetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop() != SPPressureDrop_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3511 cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP provided in the direct solution file: " << std::setprecision(16) << SPPressureDrop_ << endl;
3512 config->SetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop(SPPressureDrop_);
3513 }
3514 else {
3515 if ((config->GetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop() != SPPressureDrop_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3516 cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP in the direct solution file." << endl;
3517 }
3518
3519 /*--- External iteration ---*/
3520
3521 if ((!config->GetDiscard_InFiles()) && (!adjoint || (adjoint && config->GetRestart())))
3522 config->SetExtIter_OffSet(InnerIter_);
3523
3524}
3525
3526void CSolver::LoadInletProfile(CGeometry **geometry,
3527 CSolver ***solver,
3528 CConfig *config,
3529 int val_iter,
3530 unsigned short val_kind_solver,
3531 unsigned short val_kind_marker) const {
3532
3533 /*-- First, set the solver and marker kind for the particular problem at
3534 hand. Note that, in the future, these routines can be used for any solver
3535 and potentially any marker type (beyond inlets). ---*/
3536
3537 const auto KIND_SOLVER = val_kind_solver;
3538 const auto KIND_MARKER = val_kind_marker;
3539
3540 const bool time_stepping = (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::DT_STEPPING_1ST) ||
3541 (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::DT_STEPPING_2ND) ||
3542 (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::TIME_STEPPING);
3543
3544 const auto iZone = config->GetiZone();
3545 const auto nZone = config->GetnZone();
3546
3547 auto profile_filename = config->GetInlet_FileName();
3548
3549 const auto turbulence = config->GetKind_Turb_Model() != TURB_MODEL::NONE;
3550 const unsigned short nVar_Turb = turbulence ? solver[MESH_0][TURB_SOL]->GetnVar() : 0;
3551
3552 const auto species = config->GetKind_Species_Model() != SPECIES_MODEL::NONE;
3553 const unsigned short nVar_Species = species ? solver[MESH_0][SPECIES_SOL]->GetnVar() : 0;
3554
3555 /*--- names of the columns in the profile ---*/
3556 vector<string> columnNames;
3557 vector<string> columnValues;
3558
3559 /*--- Count the number of columns that we have for this flow case,
3560 excluding the coordinates. Here, we have 2 entries for the total
3561 conditions or mass flow, another nDim for the direction vector, and
3562 finally entries for the number of turbulence variables. This is only
3563 necessary in case we are writing a template profile file or for Inlet
3564 Interpolation purposes. ---*/
3565
3566 const unsigned short nCol_InletFile = 2 + nDim + nVar_Turb + nVar_Species;
3567
3568 /*--- for incompressible flow, we can switch the energy equation off ---*/
3569 /*--- for now, we write the temperature even if we are not using it ---*/
3570 /*--- because a number of routines depend on the presence of the temperature field ---*/
3571 //if (config->GetEnergy_Equation() ==false)
3572 //nCol_InletFile = nCol_InletFile -1;
3573
3574 /*--- Multizone problems require the number of the zone to be appended. ---*/
3575
3576 if (nZone > 1)
3577 profile_filename = config->GetMultizone_FileName(profile_filename, iZone, ".dat");
3578
3579 /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
3580
3581 if (time_stepping)
3582 profile_filename = config->GetUnsteady_FileName(profile_filename, val_iter, ".dat");
3583
3584
3585 // create vector of column names
3586 for (unsigned short iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3587
3588 /*--- Skip if this is the wrong type of marker. ---*/
3589 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != KIND_MARKER) continue;
3590
3591 string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3592 su2double p_total = config->GetInlet_Ptotal(Marker_Tag);
3593 su2double t_total = config->GetInlet_Ttotal(Marker_Tag);
3594 auto flow_dir = config->GetInlet_FlowDir(Marker_Tag);
3595 std::stringstream columnName,columnValue;
3596
3597 columnValue << setprecision(15);
3598 columnValue << std::scientific;
3599
3600 columnValue << t_total << "\t" << p_total <<"\t";
3601 for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3602 columnValue << flow_dir[iDim] <<"\t";
3603 }
3604
3605 columnName << "# COORD-X " << setw(24) << "COORD-Y " << setw(24);
3606 if(nDim==3) columnName << "COORD-Z " << setw(24);
3607
3608 if (config->GetKind_Regime()==ENUM_REGIME::COMPRESSIBLE){
3609 switch (config->GetKind_Inlet()) {
3610 /*--- compressible conditions ---*/
3611 case INLET_TYPE::TOTAL_CONDITIONS:
3612 columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "PRESSURE " << setw(24);
3613 break;
3614 case INLET_TYPE::MASS_FLOW:
3615 columnName << "DENSITY " << setw(24) << "VELOCITY " << setw(24);
3616 break;
3617 default:
3618 SU2_MPI::Error("Unsupported INLET_TYPE.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3619 break; }
3620 } else {
3621 switch (config->GetKind_Inc_Inlet(Marker_Tag)) {
3622 /*--- incompressible conditions ---*/
3623 case INLET_TYPE::VELOCITY_INLET:
3624 columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "VELOCITY " << setw(24);
3625 break;
3626 case INLET_TYPE::PRESSURE_INLET:
3627 columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "PRESSURE " << setw(24);
3628 break;
3629 default:
3630 SU2_MPI::Error("Unsupported INC_INLET_TYPE.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3631 break;
3632 }
3633 }
3634
3635 columnName << "NORMAL-X " << setw(24) << "NORMAL-Y " << setw(24);
3636 if(nDim==3) columnName << "NORMAL-Z " << setw(24);
3637
3638 switch (TurbModelFamily(config->GetKind_Turb_Model())) {
3639 case TURB_FAMILY::NONE: break;
3640 case TURB_FAMILY::SA:
3641 /*--- 1-equation turbulence model: SA ---*/
3642 columnName << "NU_TILDE " << setw(24);
3643 columnValue << config->GetNuFactor_FreeStream() * config->GetViscosity_FreeStream() / config->GetDensity_FreeStream() <<"\t";
3644 break;
3645 case TURB_FAMILY::KW:
3646 /*--- 2-equation turbulence model (SST) ---*/
3647 columnName << "TKE " << setw(24) << "DISSIPATION" << setw(24);
3648 columnValue << config->GetTke_FreeStream() << "\t" << config->GetOmega_FreeStream() <<"\t";
3649 break;
3650 }
3651
3652 switch (config->GetKind_Species_Model()) {
3653 case SPECIES_MODEL::NONE: break;
3654 case SPECIES_MODEL::SPECIES_TRANSPORT:
3655 for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar_Species; iVar++) {
3656 columnName << "SPECIES_" + std::to_string(iVar) + " " << setw(24);
3657 columnValue << config->GetInlet_SpeciesVal(Marker_Tag)[iVar] << "\t";
3658 }
3659 break;
3660 case SPECIES_MODEL::FLAMELET:
3661 /*--- 2-equation flamelet model ---*/
3662 columnName << "PROGRESSVAR" << setw(24) << "ENTHALPYTOT" << setw(24);
3663 columnValue << config->GetInlet_SpeciesVal(Marker_Tag)[0] << "\t" << config->GetInlet_SpeciesVal(Marker_Tag)[1]<<"\t";
3664 /*--- auxiliary species transport equations ---*/
3665 for (unsigned short iReactant = 0; iReactant < config->GetNUserScalars(); iReactant++) {
3666 columnName << config->GetUserScalarName(iReactant) << setw(24);
3667 columnValue << config->GetInlet_SpeciesVal(Marker_Tag)[config->GetNControlVars() + iReactant] << "\t";
3668 }
3669 break;
3670 }
3671
3672 columnNames.push_back(columnName.str());
3673 columnValues.push_back(columnValue.str());
3674
3675 }
3676
3677
3678 /*--- Read the profile data from an ASCII file. ---*/
3679
3680 CMarkerProfileReaderFVM profileReader(geometry[MESH_0], config, profile_filename, KIND_MARKER, nCol_InletFile, columnNames,columnValues);
3681
3682 /*--- Load data from the restart into correct containers. ---*/
3683
3684 unsigned long Marker_Counter = 0;
3685 unsigned short local_failure = 0;
3686
3687 const su2double tolerance = config->GetInlet_Profile_Matching_Tolerance();
3688
3689 for (auto iMarker = 0ul; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3690
3691 /*--- Skip if this is the wrong type of marker. ---*/
3692
3693 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != KIND_MARKER) continue;
3694
3695 /*--- Get tag in order to identify the correct inlet data. ---*/
3696
3697 const auto Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3698
3699 for (auto jMarker = 0ul; jMarker < profileReader.GetNumberOfProfiles(); jMarker++) {
3700
3701 /*--- If we have not found the matching marker string, continue to next marker. ---*/
3702
3703 if (profileReader.GetTagForProfile(jMarker) != Marker_Tag) continue;
3704
3705 /*--- Increment our counter for marker matches. ---*/
3706
3707 Marker_Counter++;
3708
3709 /*--- Get data for this profile. ---*/
3710
3711 const vector<passivedouble>& Inlet_Data = profileReader.GetDataForProfile(jMarker);
3712 const auto nColumns = profileReader.GetNumberOfColumnsInProfile(jMarker);
3713 vector<su2double> Inlet_Data_Interpolated ((nCol_InletFile+nDim)*geometry[MESH_0]->nVertex[iMarker]);
3714
3715 /*--- Define Inlet Values vectors before and after interpolation (if needed) ---*/
3716 vector<su2double> Inlet_Values(nCol_InletFile+nDim);
3717 vector<su2double> Inlet_Interpolated(nColumns);
3718
3719 const auto nRows = profileReader.GetNumberOfRowsInProfile(jMarker);
3720
3721 /*--- Pointer to call Set and Evaluate functions. ---*/
3722 vector<C1DInterpolation*> interpolator(nColumns,nullptr);
3723 string interpolation_function, interpolation_type;
3724
3725 /*--- Define the reference for interpolation. ---*/
3726 unsigned short radius_index=0;
3727 vector<su2double> InletRadii = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, radius_index);
3728 vector<su2double> Interpolation_Column (nRows);
3729
3730 bool Interpolate = true;
3731
3732 switch(config->GetKindInletInterpolationFunction()){
3733
3734 case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::NONE):
3735 Interpolate = false;
3736 break;
3737
3738 case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::AKIMA_1D):
3739 for (auto iCol=0ul; iCol < nColumns; iCol++){
3740 Interpolation_Column = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, iCol);
3741 interpolator[iCol] = new CAkimaInterpolation(InletRadii,Interpolation_Column);
3742 }
3743 interpolation_function = "AKIMA";
3744 break;
3745
3746 case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::LINEAR_1D):
3747 for (auto iCol=0ul; iCol < nColumns; iCol++){
3748 Interpolation_Column = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, iCol);
3749 interpolator[iCol] = new CLinearInterpolation(InletRadii,Interpolation_Column);
3750 }
3751 interpolation_function = "LINEAR";
3752 break;
3753
3754 case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::CUBIC_1D):
3755 for (auto iCol=0ul; iCol < nColumns; iCol++){
3756 Interpolation_Column = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, iCol);
3757 interpolator[iCol] = new CCubicSpline(InletRadii,Interpolation_Column);
3758 }
3759 interpolation_function = "CUBIC";
3760 break;
3761
3762 default:
3763 SU2_MPI::Error("Unknown type of interpolation function for inlets.\n",CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3764 break;
3765 }
3766
3767 if (Interpolate){
3768 switch(config->GetKindInletInterpolationType()){
3769 case(INLET_INTERP_TYPE::VR_VTHETA):
3770 interpolation_type="VR_VTHETA";
3771 break;
3772 case(INLET_INTERP_TYPE::ALPHA_PHI):
3773 interpolation_type="ALPHA_PHI";
3774 break;
3775 }
3776 cout<<"Inlet Interpolation being done using "<<interpolation_function
3777 <<" function and type "<<interpolation_type<<" for "<< Marker_Tag<<endl;
3778 if(nDim == 3)
3779 cout<<"Ensure the flow direction is in z direction"<<endl;
3780 else if (nDim == 2)
3781 cout<<"Ensure the flow direction is in x direction"<<endl;
3782 }
3783 else {
3784 cout<<"No Inlet Interpolation being used"<<endl;
3785 }
3786
3787 /*--- Loop through the nodes on this marker. ---*/
3788
3789 for (auto iVertex = 0ul; iVertex < geometry[MESH_0]->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3790
3791 const auto iPoint = geometry[MESH_0]->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3792 const auto Coord = geometry[MESH_0]->nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
3793
3794 if (!Interpolate) {
3795
3796 su2double min_dist = 1e16;
3797
3798 /*--- Find the distance to the closest point in our inlet profile data. ---*/
3799
3800 for (auto iRow = 0ul; iRow < nRows; iRow++) {
3801
3802 /*--- Get the coords for this data point. ---*/
3803
3804 const auto index = iRow*nColumns;
3805
3806 const auto dist = GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord, &Inlet_Data[index]);
3807
3808 /*--- Check is this is the closest point and store data if so. ---*/
3809
3810 if (dist < min_dist) {
3811 min_dist = dist;
3812 for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < nColumns; iVar++)
3813 Inlet_Values[iVar] = Inlet_Data[index+iVar];
3814 }
3815
3816 }
3817
3818 /*--- If the diff is less than the tolerance, match the two.
3819 We could modify this to simply use the nearest neighbor, or
3820 eventually add something more elaborate here for interpolation. ---*/
3821
3822 if (min_dist < tolerance) {
3823
3824 solver[MESH_0][KIND_SOLVER]->SetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Values.data(), iMarker, iVertex);
3825
3826 } else {
3827
3828 unsigned long GlobalIndex = geometry[MESH_0]->nodes->GetGlobalIndex(iPoint);
3829 cout << "WARNING: Did not find a match between the points in the inlet file\n";
3830 cout << "and point " << GlobalIndex;
3831 cout << std::scientific;
3832 cout << " at location: [" << Coord[0] << ", " << Coord[1];
3833 if (nDim==3) cout << ", " << Coord[2];
3834 cout << "]\n";
3835 cout << "Distance to closest point: " << min_dist << "\n";
3836 cout << "Current tolerance: " << tolerance << "\n\n";
3837 cout << "You can increase the tolerance for point matching by changing the value\n";
3838 cout << "of the option INLET_MATCHING_TOLERANCE in your *.cfg file." << endl;
3839 local_failure++;
3840 break;
3841 }
3842
3843 }
3844 else { // Interpolate
3845
3846 /* --- Calculating the radius and angle of the vertex ---*/
3847 /* --- Flow should be in z direction for 3D cases ---*/
3848 /* --- Or in x direction for 2D cases ---*/
3849 const su2double Interp_Radius = sqrt(pow(Coord[0],2)+ pow(Coord[1],2));
3850 const su2double Theta = atan2(Coord[1],Coord[0]);
3851
3852 /* --- Evaluating and saving the final spline data ---*/
3853 for (auto iVar=0ul; iVar < nColumns; iVar++){
3854
3855 /*---Evaluate spline will get the respective value of the Data set (column) specified
3856 for that interpolator[iVar], cycling through all columns to get all the
3857 data for that vertex ---*/
3858 Inlet_Interpolated[iVar]=interpolator[iVar]->EvaluateSpline(Interp_Radius);
3859 if (Interp_Radius < InletRadii.front() || Interp_Radius > InletRadii.back()) {
3860 cout << "WARNING: Did not find a match between the radius in the inlet file " ;
3861 cout << std::scientific;
3862 cout << "at location: [" << Coord[0] << ", " << Coord[1];
3863 if (nDim == 3) {cout << ", " << Coord[2];}
3864 cout << "]";
3865 cout << " with Radius: "<< Interp_Radius << endl;
3866 cout << "You can add a row for Radius: " << Interp_Radius <<" in the inlet file ";
3867 cout << "to eliminate this issue or give proper data" << endl;
3868 local_failure++;
3869 break;
3870 }
3871 }
3872
3873 /*--- Correcting for Interpolation Type ---*/
3874
3875 Inlet_Values = CorrectedInletValues(Inlet_Interpolated, Theta, nDim, Coord,
3876 nVar_Turb, config->GetKindInletInterpolationType());
3877
3878 solver[MESH_0][KIND_SOLVER]->SetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Values.data(), iMarker, iVertex);
3879
3880 for (unsigned short iVar=0; iVar < (nCol_InletFile+nDim); iVar++)
3881 Inlet_Data_Interpolated[iVertex*(nCol_InletFile+nDim)+iVar] = Inlet_Values[iVar];
3882
3883 }
3884
3885 } // end iVertex loop
3886
3887 if (config->GetPrintInlet_InterpolatedData()) {
3888 PrintInletInterpolatedData(Inlet_Data_Interpolated, profileReader.GetTagForProfile(jMarker),
3889 geometry[MESH_0]->nVertex[iMarker], nDim, nCol_InletFile+nDim);
3890 }
3891
3892 for (auto& interp : interpolator) delete interp;
3893
3894 } // end jMarker loop
3895
3896 if (local_failure > 0) break;
3897
3898 } // end iMarker loop
3899
3900 unsigned short global_failure;
3901 SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&local_failure, &global_failure, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3902
3903 if (global_failure > 0) {
3904 SU2_MPI::Error("Prescribed inlet data does not match markers within tolerance.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3905 }
3906
3907 /*--- Copy the inlet data down to the coarse levels if multigrid is active.
3908 Here, we use a face area-averaging to restrict the values. ---*/
3909
3910 for (auto iMesh = 1u; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
3911 for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3912 if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == KIND_MARKER) {
3913
3914 const auto Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3915
3916 /* Check the number of columns and allocate temp array. */
3917
3918 unsigned short nColumns = 0;
3919 for (auto jMarker = 0ul; jMarker < profileReader.GetNumberOfProfiles(); jMarker++) {
3920 if (profileReader.GetTagForProfile(jMarker) == Marker_Tag) {
3921 nColumns = profileReader.GetNumberOfColumnsInProfile(jMarker);
3922 break;
3923 }
3924 }
3925 vector<su2double> Inlet_Values(nColumns);
3926 vector<su2double> Inlet_Fine(nColumns);
3927
3928 /*--- Loop through the nodes on this marker. ---*/
3929
3930 for (auto iVertex = 0ul; iVertex < geometry[iMesh]->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3931
3932 /*--- Get the coarse mesh point and compute the boundary area. ---*/
3933
3934 const auto iPoint = geometry[iMesh]->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3935 const auto Normal = geometry[iMesh]->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3936 const su2double Area_Parent = GeometryToolbox::Norm(nDim, Normal);
3937
3938 /*--- Reset the values for the coarse point. ---*/
3939
3940 for (auto& v : Inlet_Values) v = 0.0;
3941
3942 /*-- Loop through the children and extract the inlet values
3943 from those nodes that lie on the boundary as well as their
3944 boundary area. We build a face area-averaged value for the
3945 coarse point values from the fine grid points. Note that
3946 children from the interior volume will not be included in
3947 the averaging. ---*/
3948
3949 for (auto iChildren = 0u; iChildren < geometry[iMesh]->nodes->GetnChildren_CV(iPoint); iChildren++) {
3950 const auto Point_Fine = geometry[iMesh]->nodes->GetChildren_CV(iPoint, iChildren);
3951
3952 auto Area_Children = solver[iMesh-1][KIND_SOLVER]->GetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Fine.data(), Point_Fine, KIND_MARKER,
3953 Marker_Tag, geometry[iMesh-1], config);
3954 for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nColumns; iVar++)
3955 Inlet_Values[iVar] += Inlet_Fine[iVar]*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
3956 }
3957
3958 /*--- Set the boundary area-averaged inlet values for the coarse point. ---*/
3959
3960 solver[iMesh][KIND_SOLVER]->SetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Values.data(), iMarker, iVertex);
3961
3962 }
3963 }
3964 }
3965 }
3966
3967}
3968
3969
3970void CSolver::ComputeVertexTractions(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
3971
3972 const bool viscous_flow = config->GetViscous();
3973 const su2double Pressure_Inf = config->GetPressure_FreeStreamND();
3974
3975 for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3976
3977 /*--- If this is defined as a wall ---*/
3978 if (!config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) continue;
3979
3980 // Loop over the vertices
3981 for (auto iVertex = 0ul; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3982
3983 // Recover the point index
3984 const auto iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3985
3986 su2double auxForce[3] = {0.0};
3987
3988 // Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node).
3989 if (geometry->nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
3990
3991 // Get the normal at the vertex: this normal goes inside the fluid domain.
3992 const su2double* Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3993
3994 // Retrieve the values of pressure
3995 const su2double Pn = base_nodes->GetPressure(iPoint);
3996
3997 // Calculate tn in the fluid nodes for the inviscid term --> Units of force (non-dimensional).
3998 for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3999 auxForce[iDim] = -(Pn-Pressure_Inf)*Normal[iDim];
4000
4001 // Calculate tn in the fluid nodes for the viscous term
4002 if (viscous_flow) {
4003 const su2double Viscosity = base_nodes->GetLaminarViscosity(iPoint);
4004 su2double Tau[3][3];
4005 CNumerics::ComputeStressTensor(nDim, Tau, base_nodes->GetVelocityGradient(iPoint), Viscosity);
4006 for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4007 auxForce[iDim] += GeometryToolbox::DotProduct(nDim, Tau[iDim], Normal);
4008 }
4009 }
4010 }
4011
4012 // Redimensionalize the forces (Lref is 1, thus only Pref is needed).
4013 for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4014 VertexTraction[iMarker][iVertex][iDim] = config->GetPressure_Ref() * auxForce[iDim];
4015 }
4016 }
4017 }
4018
4019}
4020
4021void CSolver::RegisterVertexTractions(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
4022
4023 unsigned short iMarker, iDim;
4024 unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
4025
4026 /*--- Loop over all the markers ---*/
4027 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
4028
4029 /*--- If this is defined as a wall ---*/
4030 if (!config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) continue;
4031
4032 /*--- Loop over the vertices ---*/
4033 SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(OMP_MIN_SIZE)
4034 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4035
4036 /*--- Recover the point index ---*/
4037 iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4038
4039 /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node) ---*/
4040 if (!geometry->nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4041
4042 /*--- Register the vertex traction as output ---*/
4043 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4044 AD::RegisterOutput(VertexTraction[iMarker][iVertex][iDim]);
4045 }
4046 }
4047 END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4048 }
4049
4050}
4051
4052void CSolver::SetVertexTractionsAdjoint(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
4053
4054 unsigned short iMarker, iDim;
4055 unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
4056 int index;
4057
4058 /*--- Loop over all the markers ---*/
4059 for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
4060
4061 /*--- If this is defined as a wall ---*/
4062 if (!config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) continue;
4063
4064 /*--- Loop over the vertices ---*/
4065 SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(OMP_MIN_SIZE)
4066 for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4067
4068 /*--- Recover the point index ---*/
4069 iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4070
4071 /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node) ---*/
4072 if (!geometry->nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4073
4074 /*--- Set the adjoint of the vertex traction from the value received ---*/
4075 for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4076 AD::SetIndex(index, VertexTraction[iMarker][iVertex][iDim]);
4077 AD::SetDerivative(index, SU2_TYPE::GetValue(VertexTractionAdjoint[iMarker][iVertex][iDim]));
4078 }
4079 }
4080 END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4081 }
4082
4083}

4085
4086void CSolver::SetVerificationSolution(unsigned short nDim,
4087 unsigned short nVar,
4088 CConfig *config) {
4089
4090 /*--- Determine the verification solution to be set and
4091 allocate memory for the corresponding class. ---*/
4092 switch( config->GetVerification_Solution() ) {
4093
4094 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::NONE:
4095 VerificationSolution = nullptr; break;
4096 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::INVISCID_VORTEX:
4097 VerificationSolution = new CInviscidVortexSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4098 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::RINGLEB:
4099 VerificationSolution = new CRinglebSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4100 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::NS_UNIT_QUAD:
4101 VerificationSolution = new CNSUnitQuadSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4102 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::TAYLOR_GREEN_VORTEX:
4103 VerificationSolution = new CTGVSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4104 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::INC_TAYLOR_GREEN_VORTEX:
4105 VerificationSolution = new CIncTGVSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4106 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_NS_UNIT_QUAD:
4107 VerificationSolution = new CMMSNSUnitQuadSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4108 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_NS_UNIT_QUAD_WALL_BC:
4109 VerificationSolution = new CMMSNSUnitQuadSolutionWallBC(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4110 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_NS_TWO_HALF_CIRCLES:
4111 VerificationSolution = new CMMSNSTwoHalfCirclesSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4112 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_NS_TWO_HALF_SPHERES:
4113 VerificationSolution = new CMMSNSTwoHalfSpheresSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4114 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_INC_EULER:
4115 VerificationSolution = new CMMSIncEulerSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4116 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_INC_NS:
4117 VerificationSolution = new CMMSIncNSSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4118 case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::USER_DEFINED_SOLUTION:
4119 VerificationSolution = new CUserDefinedSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4120 }
4121}
4122
4123void CSolver::ComputeResidual_Multizone(const CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
4124
4125 SU2_OMP_PARALLEL {
4126
4127 /*--- Set Residuals to zero ---*/
4128 SU2_OMP_MASTER
4129 for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++){
4130 Residual_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
4131 Residual_Max_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
4132 }
4133 END_SU2_OMP_MASTER
4134
4135 vector<su2double> resMax(nVar,0.0), resRMS(nVar,0.0);
4136 vector<const su2double*> coordMax(nVar,nullptr);
4137 vector<unsigned long> idxMax(nVar,0);
4138
4139 /*--- Set the residuals and BGSSolution_k to solution for next multizone outer iteration. ---*/
4140 SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(roundUpDiv(nPoint,2*omp_get_num_threads()))
4141 for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4142 const su2double domain = (iPoint < nPointDomain);
4143 for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4144 const su2double Res = (base_nodes->Get_BGSSolution(iPoint,iVar) - base_nodes->Get_BGSSolution_k(iPoint,iVar))*domain;
4145
4146 /*--- Update residual information for current thread. ---*/
4147 resRMS[iVar] += Res*Res;
4148 if (fabs(Res) > resMax[iVar]) {
4149 resMax[iVar] = fabs(Res);
4150 idxMax[iVar] = iPoint;
4151 coordMax[iVar] = geometry->nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4152 }
4153 }
4154 }
4155 END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4156
4157 /*--- Reduce residual information over all threads in this rank. ---*/
4158 SU2_OMP_CRITICAL
4159 for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4160 Residual_BGS[iVar] += resRMS[iVar];
4161 AddRes_Max_BGS(iVar, resMax[iVar], geometry->nodes->GetGlobalIndex(idxMax[iVar]), coordMax[iVar]);
4162 }
4163 END_SU2_OMP_CRITICAL
4164 SU2_OMP_BARRIER
4165
4166 SetResidual_BGS(geometry, config);
4167
4168 }
4169 END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4170}
4171
4172void CSolver::BasicLoadRestart(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config, const string& filename, unsigned long skipVars) {
4173
4174 /*--- Read and store the restart metadata. ---*/
4175
4176// Read_SU2_Restart_Metadata(geometry[MESH_0], config, true, filename);
4177
4178 /*--- Read the restart data from either an ASCII or binary SU2 file. ---*/
4179
4180 if (config->GetRead_Binary_Restart()) {
4181 Read_SU2_Restart_Binary(geometry, config, filename);
4182 } else {
4183 Read_SU2_Restart_ASCII(geometry, config, filename);
4184 }
4185
4186 /*--- Load data from the restart into correct containers. ---*/
4187
4188 unsigned long iPoint_Global_Local = 0;
4189
4190 for (auto iPoint_Global = 0ul; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
4191
4192 /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
4193 on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
4194
4195 const auto iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
4196
4197 if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
4198
4199 /*--- We need to store this point's data, so jump to the correct
4200 offset in the buffer of data from the restart file and load it. ---*/
4201
4202 const auto index = iPoint_Global_Local*Restart_Vars[1] + skipVars;
4203
4204 for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4205 base_nodes->SetSolution(iPoint_Local, iVar, Restart_Data[index+iVar]);
4206 }
4207
4208 iPoint_Global_Local++;
4209 }
4210
4211 }
4212
4213 /*--- Delete the class memory that is used to load the restart. ---*/
4214
4215 Restart_Vars = decltype(Restart_Vars){};
4216 Restart_Data = decltype(Restart_Data){};
4217
4218 /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
4219
4220 if (iPoint_Global_Local != nPointDomain) {
4221 SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
4222 string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4223 }
4224}
4225
4226void CSolver::SavelibROM(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool converged) {
4227
4228#if defined(HAVE_LIBROM) && !defined(CODI_FORWARD_TYPE) && !defined(CODI_REVERSE_TYPE)
4229 const bool unsteady = config->GetTime_Domain();
4230 const string filename = config->GetlibROMbase_FileName();
4231 const unsigned long TimeIter = config->GetTimeIter();
4232 const unsigned long nTimeIter = config->GetnTime_Iter();
4233 const int maxBasisDim = config->GetMax_BasisDim();
4234 const int save_freq = config->GetRom_SaveFreq();
4235 int dim = int(nPointDomain * nVar);
4236 bool incremental = false;
4237
4238 if (!u_basis_generator) {
4239
4240 /*--- Define SVD basis generator ---*/
4241 auto timesteps = static_cast<int>(nTimeIter - TimeIter);
4242 CAROM::Options svd_options = CAROM::Options(dim, timesteps, -1,
4243 false, true).setMaxBasisDimension(int(maxBasisDim));
4244
4245 if (config->GetKind_PODBasis() == POD_KIND::STATIC) {
4246 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Creating static basis generator." << std::endl;
4247
4248 if (unsteady) {
4249 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Incremental basis generator recommended for unsteady simulations." << std::endl;
4250 }
4251 }
4252 else {
4253 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Creating incremental basis generator." << std::endl;
4254
4255 svd_options.setIncrementalSVD(1.0e-3, config->GetDelta_UnstTime(),
4256 1.0e-2, config->GetDelta_UnstTime()*nTimeIter, true).setDebugMode(false);
4257 incremental = true;
4258 }
4259
4260 u_basis_generator.reset(new CAROM::BasisGenerator(
4261 svd_options, incremental,
4262 filename));
4263
4264 // Save mesh ordering
4265 std::ofstream f;
4266 f.open(filename + "_mesh_" + to_string(rank) + ".csv");
4267 for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
4268 unsigned long globalPoint = geometry->nodes->GetGlobalIndex(iPoint);
4269 auto Coord = geometry->nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4270
4271 for (unsigned long iDim; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4272 f << Coord[iDim] << ", ";
4273 }
4274 f << globalPoint << "\n";
4275 }
4276 f.close();
4277 }
4278
4279 if (unsteady && (TimeIter % save_freq == 0)) {
4280 // give solution and time steps to libROM:
4281 su2double dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTime();
4282 su2double t = config->GetCurrent_UnstTime();
4283 u_basis_generator->takeSample(const_cast<su2double*>(base_nodes->GetSolution().data()), t, dt);
4284 }
4285
4286 /*--- End collection of data and save POD ---*/
4287
4288 if (converged) {
4289
4290 if (!unsteady) {
4291 // dt is different for each node, so just use a placeholder dt
4292 su2double dt = base_nodes->GetDelta_Time(0);
4293 su2double t = dt*TimeIter;
4294 u_basis_generator->takeSample(const_cast<su2double*>(base_nodes->GetSolution().data()), t, dt);
4295 }
4296
4297 if (config->GetKind_PODBasis() == POD_KIND::STATIC) {
4298 u_basis_generator->writeSnapshot();
4299 }
4300
4301 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Computing SVD" << std::endl;
4302 int rom_dim = u_basis_generator->getSpatialBasis()->numColumns();
4303
4304 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Basis dimension: " << rom_dim << std::endl;
4305 u_basis_generator->endSamples();
4306
4307 if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "ROM Sampling ended" << std::endl;
4308 }
4309
4310#else
4311 SU2_MPI::Error("SU2 was not compiled with libROM support.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4312#endif
4313
4314}
